channel.title: EASYRSC how to make a lan server or public server
channel.description: I did the port fowarding, I just need to know exactly what todo after that. :| [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] You have 6 topics on the first page of the help section. Stick to ONE and stop demanding help, no-one has any obligation to help you and being an asshat will only discourage people from doing so.[/center]
